hero.title: Building Resilient Communities, Transforming Futures
hero.subtitle: CArCRT is a community-rooted and nationally engaged non-profit organization dedicated to building resilient, inclusive, and empowered communities across Sierra Leone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To enhance community resilience through sustainable development initiatives that address the root causes of vulnerability in Sierra Leone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A Sierra Leone where every community thrives with dignity, equality, and sustainable prosperity.

thematicFocus.title: Our Thematic Focus Areas
thematicFocus.subtitle: We work across multiple sectors to create lasting, positive change in communities
